hero.title: Random ‚Ä¢ One click. 5 strangers. 1 bar.
hero.subtitle: In one click, we create your group of 5 and choose an open bar near you. Real encounters, no swiping.

how_it_works.title: How Random Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Your adventure in 4 simple steps
how_it_works.step1_desc: One click and we handle everything
how_it_works.step3_desc: We choose a random open bar near you

why_random.title: Why Random Changes Everything?
why_random.subtitle: It's time to find authentic evenings and real encounters!
why_random.benefit1_desc: No filters, no chatter. Real people, real moments.
why_random.benefit2_desc: Every evening is unique. Let the surprise work.
why_random.benefit3_desc: 1 click, that's all. Less screen, more instant.
why_random.benefit4_desc: Free beta in Paris. Sorted bars and friendly atmospheres.

no_more.title: Breaking Traditional App Codes
no_more.subtitle: Random innovations for authentic connections
no_more.beta_desc: It's free and we improve the experience every day. Thanks for your feedback!
no_more.evening_status: ‚è∞ Randers go out in the evening
no_more.evening_desc: Best times to find people: 5 PM‚Äì11 PM. See you later üåô
no_more.community_desc: We start small, with big ambition. Spread the word and let's write the sequel together üá´üá∑
no_more.feature1_desc: Randomness chooses for you! No more infinite scroll, no more impossible choices.
no_more.feature2_desc: We discover each other for real, without filters or pretense!
no_more.feature3_desc: Less endless 'hi how are you?', more real conversations!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer frankly, without detour. As we like it at Random!
faq.a1: Yes. Randomness creates the magic of encounters. And at 5, we always feel comfortable.
faq.q2: Why is the bar revealed after?
faq.a2: To keep the surprise. We choose an open, accessible and validated bar.
faq.q3: What if the group doesn't suit me?
faq.a3: The goal: have a good time and expand your circle. Keep an open mind.
faq.a4: Yes, the beta is free in Paris during the entire testing period.
faq.a5: Yes. Public places only, group of 5, and real-time monitoring in the app.

cta.title: Ready for your next adventure?
cta.subtitle: Join Random: 1 click, 1 group, 1 bar. Real encounters near you.
cta.beta_info: Free beta in Paris ongoing. Lyon coming soon.

footer.tagline: All rights reserved. Dare the unexpected.
footer.made_in: Designed with audacity in Coruscant for everyday adventurers.

outings.title: Adventure History
outings.subtitle: Your latest Random outings
outings.no_adventures_desc: Join your first group to start your adventure!

contact.title: Contact & FAQ
contact.contact_desc: We're a small team passionate about real encounters. Don't hesitate to reach out!
contact.bug_q: I found a bug, how do I report it?
contact.bug_a: Send us an email with a description of the problem and we'll fix it quickly!
contact.feature_q: I have an idea for a feature
contact.feature_a: We love suggestions! Tell us about your ideas, we read everything.
contact.how_a: Simple: you click, we form a group of 5 near you and choose a bar. Just show up!
contact.partner_q: I'm a bar owner, can I partner?
contact.partner_a: Absolutely! Contact us to discuss how to integrate your establishment.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.presentation_content: Random is a mobile application that allows users to join groups of 5 people to meet in selected bars. The service is currently in beta testing phase in Paris.
terms.acceptance_content: By using Random, you accept these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the application.
terms.responsible_use_content: You agree to use Random responsibly, respect other participants, and follow the rules of establishments visited.
terms.geolocation_content: The application uses your location to form groups and suggest nearby bars. This data is not stored permanently.
terms.safety_content: Meetings take place in public establishments. Random cannot be held responsible for interactions between users.
terms.liability_content: Random provides the service as is and cannot guarantee the presence of all participants or the quality of establishments.
terms.modification_content: We reserve the right to modify these conditions. Users will be notified of significant changes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.data_collection_content: We collect: your email, name, location (temporary), and usage data to provide the Random service.
privacy.data_usage_content: Your data is used to: create groups, suggest bars, improve the service, and ensure safety.
privacy.data_sharing_content: We do not sell your data. We may share it with partners (bars) and authorities if required by law.
privacy.geolocation_content: Location is used temporarily to form groups. It is not stored permanently.
privacy.retention_content: We keep your data as long as your account is active, then delete it within 30 days.
privacy.rights_content: You can access, modify, or delete your data by contacting us.
privacy.security_content: We use encryption and security measures to protect your data.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies to improve user experience and analyze usage.
privacy.contact_content: For any questions about your data: hello@randomapp.fr
privacy.modifications_content: This policy may be modified. We will notify users of important changes.

groups.no_group_desc: Go back to the Dashboard to start a new adventure!
groups.no_group_tip: üí° Tip: Once your group is formed, you can close the app. We'll notify you when it's ready!
